This is a toolkit that assists with generics.

Method Detail

componentType

public static Type componentType(Type type,
                                 String path)
Determines the component type. Lists is the first type, Map is the second type, etc.

Parameters:
type - The parameterized type.
path - The path to the type, used in exception message.
Returns:
The component type.

componentFinalType

public static Class<?> componentFinalType(Type type,
                                          String path)
Determines the final component type. This continues to loop over Collections until it hits a non-parameterized type.

Parameters:
type - The parameterized type.
path - The path to the type, used in exception message.
Returns:
The final component type.

rawType

public static Class<?> rawType(Type type)
Determines the raw type of the type given.

Parameters:
type - The type.
Returns:
The raw type.
